title: 3 Storied Split Type House for Sale
details:
3 storied split type house, with a total floor area of 6,500sqft built in the year 2003 on 20 perches of land, with 6 Air-conditioned bedrooms and 5 bathrooms. Centrally located close to Palawatte junction(1Km), Just few minutes drive away from the Parliament in which the land value is rapidly increasing now for sale.

Property Features:-

• Land Extent 20 Perches(When surveyed has 22 Perches)
• Floor:- Titanium/Wooden
• 4 Large Living areas
• Veranda
• Dining area
• 6 Bedrooms with A/c
• 5 Bathrooms
• 2 Large Pantries
• Kitchen
• Drivers/ Maids Qtrs
• Car Port for 4 Vehicle Parking
• Gardens in Front & Rear
• 3 Phase Electricity
• Pipe Borne Water
• Telephone

Quoted Selling Price :- LKR 55 Million
